page.title: omniORB mailing list
page.head: omniORB mailing list
page.p: There is a lively omniORB mailing list, where you can ask questions about using omniORB, report bugs, and discuss CORBA usage in general.
Go to this page to subscribe, unsubscribe or change your subscription details.
There is a lot of useful information in the mailing list archive.
Search the archive from this page. Alternatively, you may find a Google site specific search more effective.
